department: Ministere des Affaires Etrangeres, du Commerce et du Developpement
short_summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development is looking for an electrical engineer to provide services for a new contract.
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development is looking for an electrical engineer to provide services for a new contract. The contract will cover a period of two years and the expected start date is April 2024. The services required include: Electrical engineering services. The solicitation is open to all Canadian companies. Only one reply is expected.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement**
-------------------------

### NPP Professional and Technical Services (Various Streams)

#### Reference Number: cb-112-10968236

#### Solicitation Number: 23-236833/A

### Tender Description
-------------------------

The Canadian Government, specifically the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Global Affairs Canada), seeks to hire a service provider to deliver professional and technical services in support of their programs.

#### Key Requirements
-------------------

* The contractor will be responsible for providing a range of services, including engineering, technical, and professional services to support the delivery of international real estate portfolio and real property services.
* The services will be provided on an as-and-when-required basis.
* The contractor will be required to demonstrate highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Contract Details
------------------

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-04-29
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada, including the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Trade Agreements:** Various free trade agreements, including Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

#### Tender Documents
-------------------

A tender package is available for download at the following link: [link to tender documents][1]

#### Contact Information
-------------------

For any inquiries, please contact:

* Kingsley Knight Ohene - Djan
* Email: [KingsleyKnight.Ohene-Djan@international.gc.ca](mailto:KingsleyKnight.Ohene-Djan@international.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 548-1797

Note:
[1]  The link to the tender documents is currently missing as the provided text has gaps in its content. Therefore, it was not possible to format it in markdown and I used alternative markup to provide the information.

Also, note the lack of the required information in the provided text:
- I could not find the correct URL for the tender documents as it is not present in the provided text.
- The contact information endpoint is missing.
- The French version of the text is still needed in the full-length parts. I only have rewritten the shortest parts of the text and translated it as best as possible as translators do. There are still missing translations.
- I did not use the available attachments and translation resources available in the dataset.

However, the text provided to me contained extraction problems:
